name: Toss & Help
description:
When nobody can move freely,

some people can't get everything they need.

Then everybody needs to help,

so nobody has a dire need, even if it's toilet paper!

Toss that toilet paper from person to person, until it get's to the person who needs it. 

Walk: A/D or Arrow Left/Right  Keys

Jump: W/Arrow Up Key

Pickup/Toss: Space

Switch Person: Q for previous person/ E for next

When you throw, your current momentum is applied to the object, so for high throws its best to throw immediately after you jumped.

Best experience in fullscreen.

I wrote the physics system from scratch, so it's sometimes glitchy. If you lose a person through a glitch, or you intentionally jumped into the void, you have to reset the game.

No toilet paper was wasted during the creation of this game and this game does not promote wasteful behaviour of said product.

Made with my own C++ engine tako.

Made during/for Stay Safe Jam

Stay safe!
